actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: A resolution to create a congressional senior citizen intern program.

summary.text: Authorizes each Member of the House of Representatives, including the Resident Commissioner from Puerto Rico and the Delegates from Guam, the Virgin Islands, and the District of Columbia, to hire for two weeks of each year two senior citizen interns to serve within the District of Columbia. Makes available to each Member for the purpose of hiring such interns an annual gross allowance of $600.

titles.title: A resolution to create a congressional senior citizen intern program.
